General.Name: Avant Brands Inc
General.Description: Avant Brands Inc. cultivates, produces, and markets cannabis products in Canada. The company offers medical and recreational cannabis products under the BLK MKT, Tenzo, GreenTec, cognoscente, Treehugger, and Pristine brands. It distributes cannabis through medical and recreational sales channels, as well as an e-commerce website. The company was formerly known as GTEC Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Avant Brands Inc. in July 2021. Avant Brands Inc. is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 1632 Dickson Avenue, Kelowna, BC, Canada, V1Y 7T2
